value.title: 3 ways Reporting Services and Power BI work together
value.excerpt: With the release of Microsoft SQL Server 2016, I look at how Reporting Services and Power BI work together. From the Power BI mobile app, to pinning visualizations to a dashboard and how Reporting Services handles Power BI Desktop files.  #PowerBI #SSRS  SUBSCRIBE! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCFp1vaKzpfvoGai0vE5VJ0w?sub_confirmation=1

value.title: Exploring the Visio visual in Power BI
value.excerpt: Want to explore locations with data? The Visio visual in Power BI helps you do just that! Patrick looks at how to set it up and help use your data to highlight areas within a Visio diagram. value.title: Fuzzy match / merging in Power BI Desktop (October 2018)
value.excerpt: In this video, we look at the new fuzzy match / merging option within the October 2018 version of Power BI Desktop. value.title: The Power BI Smart Narrative visual is INSANE AMAZING!
value.excerpt: The smart narrative visual can help tell the story in your Power BI report. Justyna Lucznik joins us to explore the visual and to illustrate how you can generate text about your data.  Make sure you have the September 2020 version of Power BI Desktop, or later.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/visuals/power-bi-visualization-smart-narrative
